name: Mad Dog McCree
description:
Only one gunslinger can stop a Mad Dog gone wild... and that's you, partner. When the ruthless outlaw Mad Dog McCree™ goes on a rampage with a nasty pack of wanted fugitives, they leave death in their wake.

Mad Dog McCree™ and his band of cutthroats have ridden into town, kidnapped the Mayor and his daughter, and taken them to his hideout. These hombres are mean and vicious. What this town needs is a gunslinger to spray a little lead in harm's way. Relive the gunpowder glory of the Wild West with American Laser Games Arcade Classic Mad Dog McCree™!

Other exciting features for this release include:
- An American Laser Games Classic!
- Original Arcade Release
- Includes All Original Play Modes
- Remastered Game Footage
- Test Your Reflexes In Showdowns
- All-New Scoring System

1-4 players

HDTV screen resolution: 720p
